page.title: 14EMMA'S DAY IN HAXEY
page.content: dancing class.I put on my leotard and a shirt on top of it.I put on an elastic belt too.The class started at 4.30 and finished at 6.00.It was a ballet class;Pre-Elementary.I enjoyed the lesson,especially the free dance Miss Mason(my teacher)made up.At 6.00,Icame home and watched the last few minutes of the Keith Harris Show.For tea,I had three spare ribs, cheezers,(crisps)and a glass of coke.I also had a piece of chocolate cake and a penguin biscuit.I watched the Price Is Right and then I went for a shower.After that,I made a hot chocolate drink and watched Dynasty.I went to bed at 9.45,but I read until 10.15.I lay awake for a while,but I soon fell asleep.I've always liked Saturdays.
